title: References inclusive
context: ยง1-26 References inclusive. Whenever reference is made to a series of sections in the Hawaii Revised Statutes by citing only the numbers of the first and last sections connected by the word &ldquo;to&rdquo;, the reference includes both the first and last sections. [L 1955, c 57, ยง1(f); RL 1955, ยง1-31; HRS ยง1-26]
